short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snip your favorite looks and products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Snip Button can be used to collect images from other fashion websites for shopping and inspiration. These images will link back to the original websites where they were found, and can be collected and arranged into lists and looks in your personal Sassique profile.
